mapper.sql: id, title, description, cover_image, user_id, node_count, view_count, status, sort_order, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
SELECT id, title, description, cover_image, node_count, view_count, status, CASE WHEN status = 0 THEN '草稿' WHEN status = 1 THEN '已发布' WHEN status = 2 THEN '已隐藏' ELSE '未知' END as status_desc, sort_order, create_time, update_time FROM knowledge_map
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND status = #{status}
ORDER BY sort_order DESC, create_time DESC

SELECT id, title, description, cover_image, node_count, view_count, status, '已发布' as status_desc, sort_order, create_time, update_time FROM knowledge_map WHERE status = 1
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
ORDER BY sort_order DESC, create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_map ( title, description, cover_image, user_id, status, sort_order, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{coverImage}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{sortOrder}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge_map SET title = #{request.title}, description = #{request.description}, cover_image = #{request.coverImage}, sort_order = #{request.sortOrder}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
